name: Reverse Pac-Man (Distracted Coder)
description:
Welcome to Reverse Pac-Man. In this game you control the ghosts! Give it a shot!

*Clearly I did not configure the canvas correctly so make sure you play in Full Screen or download the file.

Custom music created by Scotty Rich.

Features
  • Unique Pac-Man gameplay
    • Queue up to 6 commands on each ghost
    • Don't exceed 15 total commands
    • Don't mess up or suffer the consequences 
  • 7 levels ranging in difficulty from Easy to Impossible

Controls:

Function Keyboard Start controlling the ghosts Space Queue more commands Arrow keys Switch selected ghost 1-4 Quit level Hold Escape
